qas.question: In the IHDI, inequality is factored into what three human development dimensions?
In the IHDI, inequality is never factored into what three human development dimensions?

context: The 2010 Human Development Report was the first to calculate an Inequality-adjusted Human Development Index (IHDI), which factors in inequalities in the three basic dimensions of human development (<a0_0><b1_0>income, life expectancy, and education<b1_0/><a0_0/>).
